name: Light Eater (itch) (fenrir7asteron)
description:
Your cybernetic body is plagued with a parasyte absorbing energy from your body and everything nearby. Fight your way through police robots to reach greater sources of energy and satiate the parasyte's infinite hunger... for some time.

[Controls]

Arrows: movement

`S`: attack (up to 3x)/running attack

`Shift`: absorb energy from light sources

`Space`: Energt Explosion super attack (needs 80% of energy filled)

Double tap left/right: run

`W`: pick up an item
